message.body: That is the coolest thing ever! Did your mom knit that?
It's amazing. I love it; I've got some major scarf envy. By the way, home safely. :)
Great, i got measured and then went out to lunch w ma and bro, yours?

Really productive so far. Woke up and went jogging with Jo. Got my teeth cleaned and eyes checked out. The doctor loved looking at my lattice degeneration (thinning retina)-she said it is really pronounced for someone my age, and it is quite fascinating to look at. Hitting the books now.
Did you ask Aaron if he can come to the art museum?
Aaron is going to texas for t-day. Jessie is interested and said she might b able to get us free tickets. Sorry about your eyes
Oh I really hope Jessie wants to go! It will be so nice to spend the day together.
P.s. I showed my mom and Jo the picture of your moms scarf and they are crazy about it. Go Babette!
